      • getPluginPackageInfo

        public PackageInfo getPluginPackageInfo(int index)
        Description copied from interface: MakePluginPackageService
        It returns an instance of an PackageInfo class, that is a class that contains all the package information (name, version...).
        Specified by:
        getPluginPackageInfo in interface MakePluginPackageService
        Parameters:
        index - the position of the plugin that has to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        the installer information of a plugin package. Returns null if the package doesn't exist.

      • getPluginPackageInfo

        public PackageInfo getPluginPackageInfo(String code)
        Description copied from interface: MakePluginPackageService
        It returns an instance of an PackageInfo class, that is a class that contains all the package information (name, version...).
        Specified by:
        getPluginPackageInfo in interface MakePluginPackageService
        Parameters:
        code - code of the plugin, defined in the package.info file like a property.
        Returns:
        the installer information of a plugin package. Returns null if the package doesn't exist.

      • getPluginPackageCount

        public int getPluginPackageCount()
        Description copied from interface: MakePluginPackageService
        It returns the number of plugin packages that are installed in the folder that has been added using the constructor. It can be used in an iteration process combined with the MakePluginPackageService.getPluginPackageInfo(int) method to know all the installed plugins.
        Specified by:
        getPluginPackageCount in interface MakePluginPackageService
        Returns:
        the number of plugins installed in a directory.
